ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:12:37 [Issue ID 4000-506231] urn:comicvine:4000-506231 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:08:59. [Issue ID 1498173]
ComicInfo.Summary:
A NEW STORY ARC BEGINS!
The new gods of Japan rise in Tokyo and the world will never be the same. Will the old myths survive?
NEW STORY ARC
Miscellaneous: Cover A is part of a part panorama by Steve Cummings and Tamra Bonvillain. Buy all issues of this story arc to fit them together into a massive illustration.
Cover B is a variant by Nick Bradshaw (Wolverine X-Men, Guardians of the Galaxy).
Cover C is a variant by Karibu (Survivorland).
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Steven Cummings & Tamra Bonvillain | 1 | | B | Cover B | Nick Bradshaw & Tamra Bonvillain | 2 | | C | Cover C | Karibu | 3 |
